General.Name: Asset World Corp Public Company Limited
General.Description: Asset World Corp Public Company Limited invests in, develops, and manages real estate properties in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Hotel and Related Services, and Rental and Rendering of Commercial Building Services. It owns and develops a hotels; lifestyle destinations, community shopping malls, and community markets; and mixed-use properties. The company also operates digital platforms; and engages in property leasing activities. Asset World Corp Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

1.Name: Dr. Karn  Prativedwannakij
